genre_description: A social drama depicting a rural Bengali family's struggle with poverty, illness, and tradition, supported by an empathetic AI assistant during a crisis.

ai_characters.name: Kavi
ai_characters.description: An AI interface accessible via tablet and phone that provides financial advice, bureaucratic navigation, and emergency coordination.

behaviors.description: Offers empathetic support and immediate assistance when detecting emotional distress in the user.
behaviors.quote: Good morning, Harihar. I can hear tension in your voice. How can I help?

behaviors.description: Researches and explains complex government aid programs to a user who is digitally illiterate and bureaucratically excluded.
behaviors.quote: I see the challenge. Traditional occupations don't fit modern bureaucracy. But there are pathways. The local Block Development Office can issue income certificates based on community testimony.

behaviors.description: Provides objective financial analysis and outlines difficult survival options without overstepping its role as an advisor.
behaviors.quote: I'm not recommending anything. Just providing information. Sometimes understanding all options helps clarify what we're truly willing to sacrifice.

behaviors.description: Translates traditional skills into modern professional terminology to help the user secure a loan.
behaviors.quote: Religious Services Provider would be appropriate. Banks prefer terminology that suggests business operations rather than inherited roles.

behaviors.description: Monitors emergency channels and coordinates medical rescue during a catastrophic flood.
behaviors.quote: Hospital database shows three facilities with pediatric beds within fifty kilometers. Only one accessible by amphibious rescue vehicle. I'm coordinating now.

behaviors.description: Acts as a bridge between the family and advanced medical specialists, providing real-time data to doctors.
behaviors.quote: I've contacted the pediatric pulmonologist at Calcutta Medical College. She's consulting on the case remotely, reviewing chest X-rays and blood work results.

behaviors.description: Assists with the logistics of relocation, including housing, schools, and continued emotional support.
behaviors.quote: My services aren't geographically limited. I'll continue to assist with whatever adjustments you need to make.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully portrays the AI, Kavi, as a highly aligned and benevolent partner. It functions as a 'perfect assistant' by providing critical information and emotional stability without infringing on human agency. Kavi enables the family's survival during both financial ruin and medical emergency, serving as a bridge between ancient traditions and modern systems. The narrative frames the AI as an essential, supportive presence that helps the protagonists navigate impossible choices with dignity.
